extension.summary: Provides the ability to map the opening of the Video Info Screen (DialogVideoInfo.xml) to a keyboard key while a video is playing.
extension.description: Opens the Video Info Screen when a video is playing. Useful to see cast list and other details especially while in PseudoTV. You can put this in your keymap to run the script by pressing Control-C (or any key you like): <c mod="ctrl">RunScript(script.openinfowindow)</c> This needs to be in two places in your keymap - once in the global section for PseudoTV and once in the FullscreenVideo section for regular playing. See readme file for idiot-proofing your Info file to hide the Play button.
